resume.name: THANH IM

experience.description: Perform monthly valuation of insurance liabilities and prepare detailed reports for the financial accounting department. Utilize SQL and R to conduct trend analysis on health insurance claims and optimize pricing strategies for commercial segments. Successfully passed SOA Exams P, FM, and IFM while maintaining full-time responsibilities.

Supported the property and casualty consulting team with data cleaning and preparation for loss reserve analysis. Developed Python scripts to automate the generation of exhibit tables for actuarial reports. Assisted in the peer review of predictive models for personal auto insurance rates.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
